title: Krzysztof Kieslowski - KrÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â³tki film o zabijaniu AKA A Short Film
description:
This disturbing and violent feature opens with a scene of a dead rat and a lifeless cat hanging by the neck. As the plot 

unfolds, Yatzek (Miroslaw Baka) is a 20-year-old drifter who murders a testy taxi driver (Jan Tesarz) in a gut-wrenching 

scene of excessive violence. Tension continues to build as a newly licensed young attorney (Krzysztof Globisz is chosen to 

represent Yatzek in court. Much anticipated and well-received at Cannes, the film won the European Film Academy Award 

for "Best European Film" in 1988.
